title: Bellarose
description: Join Bellarose in the adventure of a lifetime as she finds a magical library—one that turns books into portals that lead to a world of fantasy where she becomes a character inside each story.Instead of visiting familiar tales as old as time, the classic stories each have a new twist. Characters will crossover in new retellings—with Aerowyn the Enchantress manipulating it all. In this short four chapter prequel to The Aerowyn Tales, get ready to enter a world of magic like none you’ve ever seen before.
author: Carla Reighard
